[[index]]

I like using the Tender (github.com/jacoborus/tender.vim) color scheme 
everywhere.

# If `true`, bold text is drawn using the bright color variants.
#draw_bold_text_with_bright_colors: false
# Colors (Tomorrow Night Bright)
colors:
  # Default colors
  primary:
    background: '#282828'
    foreground: '#eeeeee'

  # Normal colors
  normal:
    black: '#282828'
    red: '#f43753'
    green: '#c9d05c'
    yellow: '#ffc24b'
    blue: '#b3deef'
    magenta: '#d3b987'
    cyan: '#73cef4'
    white: '#eeeeee'

  # Bright colors
  bright:
    black: '#4c4c4c'
    red: '#f43753'
    green: '#c9d05c'
    yellow: '#ffc24b'
    blue: '#b3deef'
    magenta: '#d3b987'
    cyan: '#73cef4'
    white: '#feffff'
theme: Tender
